loginSchema.email: Please enter a valid email address
loginSchema.password: Password must be at least 6 characters

signupSchema.name: Name must be at least 1 character
signupSchema.lastName: Last name must be at least 1 character

newTemplateSchema.title: Title is required
newTemplateSchema.tags: You need to add at least one tag

newTemplateSchema.imageType: File must be a PNG, JPG, or JPEG image

errors.general: Something went wrong, please try again later.

patchAnswerCodeMessage.400: Invalid data. Please double-check the information you provided.
patchAnswerCodeMessage.401: Your session has expired. Please log in to continue editing the answer.
patchAnswerCodeMessage.403: You're not allowed to edit this answer.
patchAnswerCodeMessage.404: The answer you're trying to edit doesn't exist.
patchAnswerCodeMessage.422: The answer you're trying to update doesn't match the question type.
patchAnswerCodeMessage.500: We couldn't process your request. Please try again later.

loginCodeMessages.400: Invalid request. Please check your email or password and try again.
loginCodeMessages.500: We encountered an error. Please check your email or password or try again later.

signupCodeMessages.400: Invalid request. Please double-check the data you entered.
signupCodeMessages.500: We couldn't process your request. Please try again later.

patchUserCodeMessages.400: Invalid request. The data you provided isn't valid.
patchUserCodeMessages.401: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
patchUserCodeMessages.403: You're not allowed to perform this action.
patchUserCodeMessages.500: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

postFormCodeMessage.400: Invalid data. Please check the form details and try again.
postFormCodeMessage.401: Session expired. Please log in to submit the form.
postFormCodeMessage.422: Form submission failed. Make sure all questions are answered or check if you've already submitted the form.
postFormCodeMessage.500: We encountered an issue processing your form. Please try again later.

deleteFormCodeMessage.400: The form you're trying to delete doesn't exist.
deleteFormCodeMessage.401: Please log in to delete the form. Your session has expired.
deleteFormCodeMessage.403: You don't have permission to delete this form.
deleteFormCodeMessage.500: We couldn't process your request. Please try again later.

createNewQuestionCodeMessage.400: Invalid request. Please check the details for the new question.
createNewQuestionCodeMessage.401: Your session has expired. Please log in again to create a new question.
createNewQuestionCodeMessage.500: Something went wrong while creating the question. Please try again later.

deleteQuestionFromTemplateCodeMessage.400: Invalid request. Template or question not found. Please double-check the details.
deleteQuestionFromTemplateCodeMessage.401: Your session has expired. Please log in again to delete the question.
deleteQuestionFromTemplateCodeMessage.500: We encountered an error while removing the question. Please try again later.

reorderQuestionsCodeMessage.401: Please log in again to reorder the questions. Your session has expired.
reorderQuestionsCodeMessage.500: We couldn't process your request. Please try again later.

updateQuestionsCodeMessage.400: Invalid data. Please review the question details.
updateQuestionsCodeMessage.401: Your session has expired. Please log in again to update the question.
updateQuestionsCodeMessage.500: We encountered an issue updating the question. Please try again later.

createNewTemplateCodeMessage.400: Invalid request. Please check the template details.
createNewTemplateCodeMessage.401: Your session has expired. Please log in again to create a new template.
createNewTemplateCodeMessage.500: We couldn't process your request. Please try again later.

deleteTemplateErrorCodeMessage.400: The template you're trying to delete doesn't exist.
deleteTemplateErrorCodeMessage.401: Please log in again to delete the template. Your session has expired.

deleteTemplateErrorCodeMessage.500: We encountered an error. Please try again later.
